text: William A. "Bill" Allain (February 14, 1928 - December 2, 2013) was an American politician. He held office as the 58th Governor of Mississippi as a Democrat from 1984 to 1988. Allain died December 2, 2013 in Jackson, Mississippi from unknown causes, aged 85. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Governors of Mississippi
title: William Allain
